text:
<!everyone> 
Great to have you all on board for Pilot 2:bangbang:

*Most of you have been introduced with at least 1 Mentee now* _(we're still waiting for a few stragglers :snail: to log in so will match the rest once they're in...)_

Just wanted to say *THANK YOU*:point_right: all for a very successful first day! Lots of chats seem to be taking off extremely well ... it definitely *feels better than the first pilot already*!

If you have any questions, simply ask away in this channel and either we or your fellow E-Mentors can help.

In the meantime, Happy E-Mentoring!:muscle::muscle:
